entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Makkovik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:46 AM AST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:51 AM AST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -23.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Makkovik Airport 1:00 PM AST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -23.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 55 %
Wind Chill: -38
Dewpoint: -30.1°C

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 39 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 34 except minus 38 in the Postville area.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 34 except minus 38 in the Postville area. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 48 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 26.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 48 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Wednesday 01 February 2023
